meta.title: Kiwi AI Lab — Bespoke AI Solutions for Forward-Thinking Enterprises
meta.description: Kiwi AI Lab is a boutique artificial intelligence studio specializing in custom LLM integrations, autonomous workflows, and end-to-end AI strategy for businesses that refuse to settle for ordinary.

hero.subtitle: We don't just implement AI — we architect intelligent ecosystems. From strategic consultation to production-grade deployment, Kiwi AI Lab delivers bespoke automation solutions that transform how your business operates, decides, and scales.

approach.title: The Boutique Approach
approach.subtitle: In a world of off-the-shelf AI templates, we take a fundamentally different path. Every engagement begins with deep understanding and ends with measurable transformation.

discover.title: Discover & Define
discover.description: We begin every partnership with an immersive discovery phase — mapping your operational landscape, identifying high-impact automation opportunities, and crafting a strategic AI roadmap tailored exclusively to your business objectives.

architect.title: Architect & Engineer
architect.description: Our senior engineers design and build custom AI architectures from the ground up. No templates, no shortcuts. Every integration — from retrieval-augmented generation pipelines to autonomous agent workflows — is precision-engineered for your unique requirements.

deploy.title: Deploy & Evolve
deploy.description: Deployment is only the beginning. We provide production-grade infrastructure, continuous performance monitoring, and iterative optimization to ensure your AI systems don't just launch — they compound in value over time.

techStack.title: Built on What Matters
techStack.subtitle: We leverage the most advanced models and frameworks available — not because they're trendy, but because they deliver results. Our technology choices are driven by a single criterion: what solves your problem most effectively.

services.title: Precision AI Services
services.subtitle: Three pillars of expertise, unified by a single mission: to make artificial intelligence your most valuable operational asset.

strategy.title: AI Strategy & Consulting
strategy.description: Navigate the AI landscape with confidence. We conduct comprehensive assessments of your existing workflows, identify automation opportunities with the highest ROI, and deliver a clear, executable AI strategy — complete with technology selection, timeline projections, and measurable success criteria.

llm.title: Custom LLM & RAG Integrations
llm.description: Off-the-shelf chatbots are not what we do. We engineer sophisticated, context-aware AI systems powered by retrieval-augmented generation — systems that understand your proprietary data, speak your brand's language, and deliver responses with the precision and nuance your clients expect.

automation.title: Autonomous Business Workflows
automation.description: Transform your operations with self-orchestrating AI systems that don't just respond — they anticipate, decide, and execute. From multi-agent architectures that manage complex processes end-to-end, to intelligent pipelines that eliminate manual bottlenecks, we build the future your competitors haven't imagined yet.

studio.title: The Lab Behind the Intelligence
studio.subtitle: Kiwi AI Lab isn't a factory — it's a studio. We're a deliberately small team of senior AI engineers, strategists, and architects who choose depth over breadth. Every project receives our full, undivided attention.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe the most powerful AI solutions emerge not from scale, but from precision. Our boutique model ensures that every client works directly with the minds building their systems — no account managers, no handoffs, no dilution of vision. This is AI, crafted.

principles.title: Bespoke Over Boilerplate
principles.description: Every solution is engineered from scratch for your specific context. We don't recycle architectures — we create them.

principles.title: Transparency as Standard
principles.description: You'll understand every decision we make, every technology we choose, and every trade-off we consider. Your AI is never a black box.

principles.title: Partnership, Not Procurement
principles.description: We embed ourselves in your business reality. We succeed when you succeed — and that alignment drives everything we do.

principles.title: Relentless Iteration
principles.description: The best AI systems are living systems. We build for evolution, ensuring your investment compounds in capability and value.

delivery.title: End-to-End Delivery Model
delivery.description: From first conversation to production deployment and beyond, we own every phase of the journey. Our integrated delivery model eliminates the gaps, miscommunications, and quality loss that plague fragmented vendor relationships.

phases.label: Discovery
phases.description: Deep-dive into your operations, goals, and constraints

phases.label: Architecture
phases.description: Technical design, model selection, and system blueprinting

phases.label: Development
phases.description: Agile build sprints with continuous client collaboration

phases.label: Deployment
phases.description: Production launch with infrastructure hardening and monitoring

phases.label: Evolution
phases.description: Ongoing optimization, retraining, and capability expansion

contact.title: Start a Conversation
contact.subtitle: Every transformative AI journey begins with a single conversation. Whether you have a specific challenge in mind or simply want to explore what's possible, we're here to listen.

form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your current challenges, goals, or the transformation you envision...
form.success: Your inquiry has been received. We'll be in touch within 24 hours.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or reach out directly via our contact channels.

info.title: Other Ways to Reach Us
info.locations: Kelowna, BC — Working with teams worldwide

pricing.title: Transparent Investment, Measurable Returns
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees. No long-term lock-ins. Every plan includes our full expertise, production-grade infrastructure, and a commitment to your success — or your money back.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for businesses taking their first step into AI-powered customer engagement.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities across multiple channels.

scale.name: Scale
scale.description: Full-spectrum AI automation for enterprises that demand peak operational efficiency.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Bespoke AI ecosystems for multi-location operations requiring white-glove delivery.

guarantee.title: The Zero Risk Guarantee
guarantee.description: We stand behind every solution we deliver. If you don't see measurable improvement in your operations within the first 30 days, we'll refund your investment in full — no questions asked. That's how confident we are in what we build.

footer.description: A boutique AI studio crafting bespoke intelligent systems for enterprises that demand more than ordinary automation.
